main.name: Creative work
main.explain: ...create creative pieces like paintings, or designs.

main.name: Money
main.explain: ...money is an important aspect of your daily life.

main.name: Work security
main.explain: ...you need to be able to depend on your work stability.

main.name: Post school training
main.explain: ...tertiary education is very important to you.

main.name: Working with people
main.explain: ...working and interacting with people is your niche.

main.name: Changing of routine
main.explain: ...you like change in you daily habits and routines.

main.name: Leading
main.explain: ...you like to be the one to lead the pack.

main.name: Concepts rather than people
main.explain: ...you enjoy working on your own rather then in a team.

main.name: Recognition and status
main.explain: ...you like your regular pat on the back.
